title: Vanity Nightclub Las Vegas
content:
Hi everybody,

I'm looking for a font that looks like the font used in the Vanity logo. A Las Vegas based nightclub. Love the tiny serifs. Can anyone help me out?

Ren√©
author: ReneRutten

comments.content:
Hi,

I immediately thought of Copperplate myself, but the serifs are different. Copperplate is less 'friendly'.
Maybe they added a stroke in order to soften the serifs?
